verses.verse: בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim Ye [are] the children אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem, you לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תִתְגֹּֽדְד֗וּ <S%H1413><s%> tit-go-de-Du, ye shall not cut וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor תָשִׂ֧ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> ta-Si-mu yourselves nor make קָרְחָ֛ה <S%H7144><s%> ka-re-Chah any baldness בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between עֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Chem between your eyes לָמֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> la-Met. for the dead

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> ka-do-Vosh For thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, you לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God וּבְךָ֞ u-ve-Cha בָּחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> ba-Char hath chosen יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become לוֹ֙ lo לְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <S%H5459><s%> se-gul-Lah, thee to be a peculiar מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, unto himself above all the nations אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- are on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [are] upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah. the earth ס sa-Mek
לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal Thou shalt not eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any תּוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vah. any abominable thing

זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah These [are] the beasts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu; which ye shall eat שׁ֕וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Shor the ox שֵׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> seh lesser כְשָׂבִ֖ים <S%H3775><s%> che-sa-Vim lamb וְשֵׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> ve-Seh lesser עִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim. and the goat

אַיָּ֥ל <S%H354><s%> 'ai-Yal The hart וּצְבִ֖י <S%H6643><s%> u-tze-Vi and the roebuck וְיַחְמ֑וּר <S%H3180><s%> ve-yach-Mur; and the fallow deer וְאַקּ֥וֹ <S%H689><s%> ve-'ak-Ko and the wild goat וְדִישֹׁ֖ן <S%H1788><s%> ve-di-Shon and the pygarg וּתְא֥וֹ <S%H8377><s%> u-te-'O and the wild ox וָזָֽמֶר׃ <S%H2169><s%> va-Za-mer. and the chamois

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol Any בְּהֵמָ֞ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah And every beast מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <S%H6536><s%> maf-Re-set that parteth פַּרְסָ֗ה <S%H6541><s%> par-Sah, the hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <S%H8156><s%> ve-sho-Sa-'at the cleft שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <S%H8157><s%> she-sa' and cleaveth שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei into two פְרָס֔וֹת <S%H6541><s%> fe-ra-Sot, claws מַעֲלַ֥ת <S%H5927><s%> ma-'a-Lat [and] cheweth גֵּרָ֖ה <S%H1625><s%> ge-Rah the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> bab-be-he-Mah; among the beasts אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu. that ye shall eat

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Nevertheless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֶ֞ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh of these לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo are not תֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu Nevertheless these ye shall not eat מִמַּֽעֲלֵ֣י <S%H5927><s%> mi-ma-'a-Lei of them that chew הַגֵּרָ֔ה <S%H1625><s%> hag-ge-Rah, the cud וּמִמַּפְרִיסֵ֥י <S%H6536><s%> u-mi-maf-ri-Sei or of them that divide הַפַּרְסָ֖ה <S%H6541><s%> hap-par-Sah hoof הַשְּׁסוּעָ֑ה <S%H8156><s%> hash-she-su-'Ah; the cloven אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֠גָּמָל <S%H1581><s%> Hag-ga-mol [as] the camel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאַרְנֶ֨בֶת <S%H768><s%> ha-'ar-Ne-vet and the hare וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשָּׁפָ֜ן <S%H8227><s%> hash-sha-Fan and the coney כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מַעֲלֵ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> ma-'a-Leh for they chew גֵרָ֣ה <S%H1625><s%> ge-Rah the cud הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah, like וּפַרְסָה֙ <S%H6541><s%> u-far-Sah not the hoof לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not הִפְרִ֔יסוּ <S%H6536><s%> hif-Ri-su, but divide טְמֵאִ֥ים <S%H2931><s%> te-me-'Im [therefore] they [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַ֠חֲזִיר <S%H2386><s%> Ha-cha-zir And the swine כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because מַפְרִ֨יס <S%H6536><s%> maf-Ris because it divideth פַּרְסָ֥ה <S%H6541><s%> par-Sah the hoof הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor גֵרָ֔ה <S%H1625><s%> ge-Rah, yet cheweth not the cud טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me it [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <S%H1320><s%> mib-be-sa-Ram of their flesh לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu, unto you ye shall not eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> u-ve-niv-la-Tam their dead carcase לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תִגָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> tig-Ga-'u. nor touch ס sa-Mek

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> zeh These תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu, These ye shall eat מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim; of all that [are] in the waters כֹּ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> kol anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֛וֹ lo סְנַפִּ֥יר <S%H5579><s%> se-nap-Pir all that have fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> ve-kas-Ke-set and scales תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu. shall ye eat

וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol anything אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- have ל֛וֹ lo סְנַפִּ֥יר <S%H5579><s%> se-nap-Pir And whatsoever hath not fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> ve-kas-Ke-set and scales לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu; ye may not eat טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me it [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem. ס sa-Mek
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any צִפּ֥וֹר <S%H6833><s%> tzip-Por birds טְהֹרָ֖ה <S%H2889><s%> te-ho-Rah [Of] all clean תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu. ye shall eat

וְזֶ֕ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu But these [are they] of which ye shall not eat מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem; like הַנֶּ֥שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> han-Ne-sher the eagle וְהַפֶּ֖רֶס <S%H6538><s%> ve-hap-Pe-res and the ossifrage וְהָֽעָזְנִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5822><s%> ve-Ha-'a-ze-ni-Yah. and the ospray

וְהָרָאָה֙ <S%H7201><s%> ve-ha-ra-'Ah And the glede וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָ֣אַיָּ֔ה <S%H344><s%> ha-'ai-Yah, and the kite וְהַדַּיָּ֖ה <S%H1772><s%> ve-had-dai-Yah and the vulture לְמִינָֽהּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Nah. after his kind
וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every עֹרֵ֖ב <S%H6158><s%> 'o-Rev And every raven לְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-No. after his kind

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בַּ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> bat first הַֽיַּעֲנָ֔ה <S%H3284><s%> hai-ya-'a-Nah, and the ostrich וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַתַּחְמָ֖ס <S%H8464><s%> hat-tach-Mas and the night hawk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשָּׁ֑חַף <S%H7828><s%> hash-Sha-chaf; and the cuckow וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַנֵּ֖ץ <S%H5322><s%> han-Netz and the hawk לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Ne-hu. after his kind

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכּ֥וֹס <S%H3563><s%> hak-Kos The little owl וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיַּנְשׁ֖וּף <S%H3244><s%> hai-yan-Shuf and the great owl וְהַתִּנְשָֽׁמֶת׃ <S%H8580><s%> ve-hat-tin-Sha-met. and the swan

וְהַקָּאָ֥ת <S%H6893><s%> ve-hak-ka-'At And the pelican וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָרָחָ֖מָה <S%H7360><s%> ha-ra-Cha-mah and the gier eagle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשָּׁלָֽךְ׃ <S%H7994><s%> hash-sha-Lach. and the cormorant

וְהַ֣חֲסִידָ֔ה <S%H2624><s%> ve-Ha-cha-si-Dah, And the stork וְהָאֲנָפָ֖ה <S%H601><s%> ve-ha-'a-na-Fah and the heron לְמִינָ֑הּ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Nah; after her kind וְהַדּוּכִיפַ֖ת <S%H1744><s%> ve-had-du-chi-Fat and the lapwing וְהָעֲטַלֵּֽף׃ <S%H5847><s%> ve-ha-'a-tal-Lef. and the bat

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> She-retz And every creeping thing הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> ha-'of, that flieth טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵאָכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Che-lu. unto you they shall not be eaten
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any ע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of fowls טָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor [But of] all clean תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu. ye may eat

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu Ye shall not eat כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol anything נְ֠בֵלָה <S%H5038><s%> Ne-ve-lah [of] any thing that dieth of itself לַגֵּ֨ר <S%H1616><s%> lag-Ger it unto the stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֜יךָ <S%H8179><s%> bish-'a-Rei-cha that [is] in thy gates תִּתְּנֶ֣נָּה <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nen-nah thou shalt give וַאֲכָלָ֗הּ <S%H398><s%> va-'a-cha-Lah, that he may eat א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or מָכֹר֙ <S%H4376><s%> ma-Chor it or thou mayest sell לְנָכְרִ֔י <S%H5237><s%> le-na-che-Ri, it unto an alien כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> ka-do-Vosh for thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, you לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תְבַשֵּׁ֥ל <S%H1310><s%> te-vash-Shel Thou shalt not seethe גְּדִ֖י <S%H1423><s%> ge-Di a kid בַּחֲלֵ֥ב <S%H2461><s%> ba-cha-Lev milk אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo. in his mother's פ Peh

עַשֵּׂ֣ר <S%H6237><s%> 'as-Ser Thou shalt truly תְּעַשֵּׂ֔ר <S%H6237><s%> te-'as-Ser, tithe אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all תְּבוּאַ֣ת <S%H8393><s%> te-vu-'At all the increase זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'E-cha; of thy seed הַיֹּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-Tze bringeth forth הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh that the field שָׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. by year
